title: Risk Uncertainty and Coronavirus | Ep 42
description:
I discuss the panic, fearmongering, risk, uncertainty, and market plunge associated with the worldwide outbreak of coronavirus.

Show notes:
COVID-19 isn't as deadly as we think - Slate
